Can we please find a different name? When I saw as_param() I initially though it returns an nn.Parameter. My votes would be:

  • attach() to make it consistent
  • with_grad() seems nice
  • enable_grad() to match our context manager, but be a local per-Variable thing
  • require_grad() which might be a bit too similar to the attr
  • as_differentiable() which is a bit verbose
  • as_diff() a shorter version

body:
Can we please find a different name? When I saw `as_param()` I initially though it returns an `nn.Parameter`. My votes would be:
- `attach()` to make it consistent
- `with_grad()` seems nice
- `enable_grad()` to match our context manager, but be a local per-Variable thing
- `require_grad()` which might be a bit too similar to the attr
- `as_differentiable()` which is a bit verbose
- `as_diff()` a shorter version
